overview: Experience nature's most relaxing environment as you dive into an underwater wonderland of gliding dolphins...majestic whales...playful sea lions...and adorable sea otters! Let your tensions ease away as golden sunsets melt into a panorama of spectacular color against crashing ocean waves...and sandpipers dance a delicate ballet on the shore to the calming rhythm of the tide.
title: Moodtapes: Ocean Reflections
